title: virtual bookkeeper /  virtual assistant
job_overview:
FT staff  needed in New York City. Must be willing to work graveyard shifts, 10-6pm EST.

Effective  communications skills and detailed oriented are required. Must have a pleasant telephone demeanor and be a team player.  Must know quick-book.

Requirements for this position:
1. Fast internet connection ( upload and download >100 Mbps with VPN on )
2. Dual Monitor desktop computer set up
3. Designated, sound proofed, and quiet room to work


MUST  EMAIL  THE FOLLOWING TO BE CONSIDERED:    Upgrade to see actual info
1. CV
2. Audio or video Recording ~1min long introducing yourself
3.Internet speed with VPN on AND connected to USA screenshot.
4. Internet speed without VPN screenshot.
5. Computer Specifications (PC and laptop)
6. A photo of your work station.
7. DISC personality test results.
